title: Victor Palciauskas
text:
Dr. Victor Palciauskas (born Vytautas Palčiauskas; October 3, 1941 in <a href="Kaunas">Kaunas</a>) is a <a href="Lithuania">Lithuania</a>-born American chess player who holds the <a href="chess%20title">chess title</a> of <a href="International%20Correspondence%20Chess%20Grandmaster">International Correspondence Chess Grandmaster</a>. He was the tenth <a href="World%20Correspondence%20Chess%20Champion">World Correspondence Chess Champion</a> (1978–1984).
Palciauskas tied for second place (undefeated 5/8, +2 −0 =6) behind <a href="Mikhail%20Umansky">Mikhail Umansky</a> in a "champion of champions" tournament, the ICCF 50 Years World Champion Jubilee. This was a special invitational correspondence tournament involving all living former ICCF World Champions.
